attributes.action: Introduce immediate legislation to renationalise water companies.
attributes.additional_details: For too long water companies have put profits and pay outs to share holders ahead of providing an efficient  service and investing in reducing pollution and improving infrastructure.
attributes.background: To bring water companies back under national control.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Nationalise the UK water industry
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700436
